description: This CSS file contains styles and CSS variables for managing themes (light and dark) in the application interface, including color schemes for various UI elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application component styling with center alignment and theme-dependent background and text colors.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling specific to the application logo, including animations on mouse interaction.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header component with flex layout and responsive design.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links in the application with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including responsive adjustments and hover effects.
